title: Eastern Province Water Supply Development Project - Supply & Installation of Pumps , Mechanical & Electrical Equipment, Instruments and Accessories for pump houses at Konduwattuwana, Bangalawadiya, Kalmunai, Irrakkamam, Pothuvil, Uhana, Damana, Hingurana and Water Treatment Plants and Intakes at Maha Oya and  Dehiattakandiya
decision_details: - the Eastern Province Water Supply Development Project is being implemented by the National Water Supply and Drainage Board with funds provided by the Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA) and the Government of Sri Lanka.  There are 16 major contract packages under this project and this is the 10th contract package which covers all mechanical and electrical installations of the project.  The proposal made by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage, to award the above contract as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
